data.comment: The match has started at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Kansas City are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 2, Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kevin Stott signals a throw-in for Kansas City, close to Salt Lake's area.
In the minute 4, In Sandy Salt Lake drive forward through Maikel Chang. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Salt Lake.
Throw-in Salt Lake.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Salt Lake.
Kevin Stott awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 10, Kevin Stott awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 12, Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Salt Lake's Corey Baird breaks free at Rio Tinto Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sandy.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Johnny Russell of Kansas City smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kansas City needs to be cautious. Salt Lake have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 16, Salt Lake's Corey Baird gets in a shot on goal at Rio Tinto Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Kansas City have a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Throw-in Salt Lake.
Free kick Kansas City.
Kansas City's Gianluca Busio misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Kansas City are pushing forward but Gerso Fernandes's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 23, Kevin Stott signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Kansas City's half.
Corey Baird of Salt Lake gets in a strike, but is off target.
Kevin Stott awards Kansas City a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
In Sandy a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Sandy, Ilie Sanchez (Kansas City) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 26, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sandy.
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
Goal kick for Kansas City at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 29, Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Kansas City push upfield and Ilie Sanchez gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Salt Lake defence.
Salt Lake's Corey Baird is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 33, Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sandy.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
In the minute 35, Gianluca Busio gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kansas City.
Salt Lake to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
Kevin Stott awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick in a good position for Salt Lake!
At Rio Tinto Stadium, Luis Martins has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
In the minute 42, Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Kevin Stott.
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Sandy, Khiry Shelton of Kansas City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Salt Lake have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Goal! Khiry Shelton gives Kansas City a 0-1 lead in Sandy.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Peter Vermes is making the team's first substitution at Rio Tinto Stadium with Erik Hurtado replacing Gerso Fernandes.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Kevin Stott awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal! Erik Hurtado extends Kansas City's lead to 0-2.
That's a fine assist from Jaylin Lindsey.
In the minute 49, Kevin Stott signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Kansas City's half.
Salt Lake will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kansas City.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
In the minute 52, Kansas City are whistled for offside.
Throw-in Kansas City.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
Kevin Stott awards Kansas City a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Salt Lake.
In the minute 56, Throw-in high up the field for Kansas City in Sandy.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
In the minute 58, Can Kansas City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Salt Lake's half?
Kansas City have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 61, Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nick Besler is on a sub for Pablo Ruiz for Salt Lake.
In the minute 63, The home team replace Justin Meram with Douglas Martinez.
Justen Glad is replacing Nedum Onuoha for the home team.
Erik Hurtado for Kansas City drives towards goal at Rio Tinto Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 65, Throw-in Salt Lake.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Salt Lake.
So close for Kansas City as Gianluca Busio's shot comes back off the post.
In the minute 66, Kansas City pushes forward through Erik Hurtado, whose finish on goal is saved.
Salt Lake are coming forward and Corey Baird gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Donny Toia (Salt Lake) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Salt Lake in Sandy.
In the minute 70, Kansas City have a goal kick.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
Kevin Stott awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kansas City have a goal kick.
Salt Lake needs to be cautious. Kansas City have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
Kevin Stott signals a throw-in for Salt Lake, close to Kansas City's area.
Throw-in Kansas City.
In the minute 79, Salt Lake to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
The away team have replaced Gianluca Busio with Felipe Hernandez. This is the second substitution made today by Peter Vermes.
Throw-in for Salt Lake close to the penalty box.
In the minute 80, Can Salt Lake capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kansas City's half?
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
Salt Lake are pushing forward but Everton Luiz's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
Kevin Stott awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 86, Salt Lake drives forward and Damir Kreilach gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Kevin Stott signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
Johnny Russell (Kansas City) has received a yellow card from Kevin Stott.
In the minute 88, Marcelo Silva gets his shot on target but fails to score for Salt Lake.
Free kick Kansas City.
Kevin Stott signals a throw-in for Kansas City, close to Salt Lake's area.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Kevin Stott signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Kansas City's half.
Goal kick for Kansas City at Rio Tinto Stadium.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
The match has come to a close in Sandy. The final score is 0-2.
